#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int T, N, phi[1000009];
long long ans[1000009];

int main ()
{
//freopen ("input", "r", stdin);
//freopen ("output", "w", stdout);

scanf ("%d", &T);
N = 1000000;
for (int i=1; i<=N; i++)
    phi[i] = i;
for (int i=2; i<=N; i++)
    if (phi[i] == i)
        for (int j=i; j<=N; j+=i)
            phi[j] /= i, phi[j] *= i - 1;
for (int i=1; i<=N; i++)
{
    long long curr = 1LL;
    if (i == 2) curr = 1;
    else
    if (i > 2) curr = 1LL * i * phi[i] / 2;
    for (int j=i; j<=N; j+=i)
        ans[j] += curr;
}
while (T --)
{
    scanf ("%d", &N);
    printf ("%lld\n", 1LL * N * ans[N]);
}

return 0;
}
